thread.title: Carly Rae Jepsen "Run Away With Me" Video - Interactive Music Video With Emojis
thread.title_full: Carly Rae Jepsen "Run Away With Me" Video - Interactive Music Video With Emojis

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Carly Rae Jepsen "Run Away With Me" Video - Interactive Music Video With Emojis
text:
Carly Rae Jepsen has gone way beyond "Call Me Maybe." Now she's more like, "Text me an emoji to dictate my every move." Her new video for ( the certified jam ) "Run Away With Me" is a choose-your-own-adventure game in which you can determine what the Canadian pop star does next.
In the video, which is an update of a previous one she released in July , Carly goes on a trip around the world, with stops in New York, Paris, and Tokyo. Occasionally you see her running in front of a mysterious guy, pulling him around by the hand. Maybe she's, you know, running away with him?
 Then, text message bubbles pop up, presumably between you and your BFF Carly. The emoji you respond with dictates the next shot in the video, whether it's a location, activity, or choice of hat. The result is totally adorable and will get the song stuck in your head for the bajillionth time. Don't say I didn't warn you.
